Review Title: Slow growth and healthy work life balance
Pros:
- You are given 12 EL, 12 SL, and 10 CL. Apply and enjoy. Nobody is going to ask you to apply 2 months before the date
- At the end of Dec, you are forcibly given 3-4 ELs (if you haven't taken any) so go and enjoy
- No work pressure. It's a product-based company.
- Work done is appreciated
- Every month or two there will be an activity and every 3-4 months there will be an outing
- Good company
Cons:
- Very slow growth both skill-wise and financial-wise
- 10-15% annual hike, if you expect more, this is not your company
- Few employment perks... food is expensive inside campus like 80-90rs a thali...

Review Title: If you don't speak French, and do not live in France, you do not exist at this company
Pros: 1. Sounds cool when you say it, cuz nobody can pronounce "dasso"for some reason, and the name itself has little name recognition.
Cons: 1. In my lifetime, this is the most fucqued up company I have ever worked for. Nobody here has a clue as to what they're doing. 2. Its a hodge-podge of acquired companies, all who hate ech other. 3. Even their Flagship Solidworks product has been superceded in the industry. 4. Dassault's naivety and impudence caused them to miss all of the market clues, allowing Siemens and PTC to eat their lunch. 5. You will never, ever go anywhere at this company unless you speak French and live in Paris. 6. The 3DExperience platform is the most horrible example of code that there ever was. And due to DS insistence that everything be attached to this old dinosaur of a platform (except for interfaces that make sense), most projects fall over their own appendage when the project leaves the gate. 6. Their customer satisfaction level is between zero and none because of their wacky internal administrative architecture.

Pros: Good work life balance , flexible environmnet
Cons: project specific micromanagment, more appriciation , award reward

Pros: Innovative Technology Leader: Dassault Systèmes is truly an innovative leader in the field of 3D design and engineering. Their software solutions have transformed the way we conceptualize and develop products. Their constant drive for innovation is impressive. Comprehensive Product Suite: Dassault Systèmes offers a comprehensive suite of software solutions that cater to a wide range of industries, from aerospace and automotive to healthcare and consumer goods. This versatility is a testament to their commitment to meeting diverse industry needs. Intuitive and User-Friendly: Users often praise Dassault Systèmes for its user-friendly interfaces and intuitive tools. Learning curves are manageable, and even novice users can quickly become proficient with their software. Collaborative Capabilities: One of the standout features of Dassault Systèmes is its robust collaboration capabilities. Their software enables teams to work seamlessly together, which is especially valuable in today's globalized business world. Sustainability Focus: Dassault Systèmes places a strong emphasis on sustainability and environmentally friendly design. Their software allows companies to reduce waste, optimize resources, and make more eco-conscious decisions. Customer Support and Training: Dassault Systèmes offers excellent customer support and training resources. Their commitment to helping customers succeed is evident in the quality of their training programs and responsive support teams. Reliable and Stable: Users often highlight the stability and reliability of Dassault Systèmes' software. This is a critical factor in industries where errors can have significant consequences. Global Reach: Dassault Systèmes' global presence and the adoption of their software by top companies worldwide demonstrate the trust and confidence placed in their solutions. Future-Proofing: Dassault Systèmes constantly updates and enhances its software to keep up with the rapidly changing technological landscape. Users appreciate that their investments are future-proofed. Cost Efficiency: Many users find that, despite the initial investment, Dassault Systèmes' solutions provide cost savings in the long run through improved efficiency and reduced development time. In summary, Dassault Systèmes is highly regarded for its innovative, user-friendly, and collaborative software solutions, making it a top choice for businesses across various industries. Their commitment to sustainability, customer support, and continuous improvement further solidify their reputation as a leader in the field of 3D design and engineering.
